relnotes.name: Software Install Framework
relnotes.purpose: Provides a uniform framework for managing software under Symbian OS.

defect.title: CBR errors related to sif in M04892 v9.6 build

relnotes.defect: CBR errors related to sif in M04892 v9.6 build are fixed.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Reference Native Installer provision
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the set of features for the Preq1269 Phase III. Changes has been done for Reference Native Installer.

defect.title: KERN-EXEC 3 panic in sifserver.exe when changing the SCOMO state
PREQ1269: SIFLauncher's configuration should be split into production and test

relnotes.defect: SIFLauncher's configuration has been splitted into production and test.
Changed SIS file generation in SIF tests to use permanent certificates.
Added deletion of temporary certificates added by createsis.

defect.title: SMPSAFE MMP file updates for SWI and USIF

relnotes.defect: updated MMP files for SWI and USIF components to declare them SMPSAFE

defect.title: PREQ1269: Can set the component size negative

relnotes.defect: The API wasn't changed to Uint, as this would require the DB also to support unsigned values in the relevant column, and I couldn't see an option for doing it without disrupting the schema.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Indication of executable code
deliverystep.preq: Incudes changes to enable the installer to indicate that the software component has an executable, before the installation takes place.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Plugin management and highly desirable features (Phase 2)
deliverystep.preq: 1) Post-manufacture plugin management 2) Complex queries in the SCR 3) Additional smaller requirements and changes and 4) Improved security in the SCR

defect.title: PREQ1269: SIFSERVER.EXE crashing with panic KERN-EXEC 3

relnotes.defect: Parameter handling (filename, file handle, component id) in CSifServerTask::SelectAndLoadPluginL() for different types of task (install, uninstall, get component info, activate, deactivate) has been fixed.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Security and Data Privacy: Universal Software Install Framework (Phase 1)
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.
